body: Robbers are expert thieves who commit burglary, robbery, and other violent crimes for profit. A typical robber is a 3rd-level expert or rogue with 3 ranks each in Climb, Disable Device, Intimidate, Perception, and Stealth.
name: Robbers
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Teams/Robbers
